abstract: The Lens blog has posted a series of black-and-white photographs of Swiss bankers in Zurich. "It became about how to photograph what you can't see, what you can't photograph," said Mark Henley, the photographer, who focused on Credit Suisse and UBS executives. "I couldn't show, I had to tell."
